item.description:
New Year means NEW Beginnings!! So lets start the year out right! Lets gather together for a fun/unique workshop type event that is geared to both individually & collectively establish clear intentions for 2010!

This WILL NOT be your typical goal setting seminar...in fact I find that goals for me are counter productive....must be my rebellious side???? I find when I pressure myself in a 'goal sense' it always does the opposite.

So I've decided to go a different route..I call it the ANTI-goal setting OR Theme based goals. By incorporating the Synergistic Inspiration motto, Imagine~Create~Become we create simple daily tools that prepare us and propel that which we desire TO us.

Imagine: We are going to create an overall, POWERFUL ANNUAL theme which will radiate through the other theme based areas of life (Relationships, Financial, Career, Fun/Hobbies, Health & Wellness)

Create: We are going to create an easy 10-15 minute daily ritual that we will be committed too make this happen. Remember...our desires manifest in the small, heroic daily steps we take...its in the smallest of change...

Become: We are also going to face any resistance/fears surrounding these themes by creating powerful affirmations that are tailored specifically to you.

Join me in this creative process....lets create a 2010 like you've never seen before!!!

Dani

**Please note** Workshop is $10 each. Bring a friend, your favorite notebook, cash for the bar and food if hungry, and of course come open minded...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess where Cocktails & Conversations
item.name: Cocktails & Convo's 2010 Annual Master-Mind
